item.title: Things look different around here...
item.description: Wow! It's so empty and generic! I decided to give my site a huge overhaul after a year of not updating it. It was far too daunting when it was all fancy-like... It'll start having more character eventually, but I needed a blank slate. Mind the mess.

item.title: RSS feed now up
item.description: Finally added an RSS feed to this site, rather than an ever-expanding wall of text for updates. Was rather clunky. This is a test... cheers to making websites and whatnot.
